review: essentially,the game is a border inspector simulator(which is probabbly the most unused genre ever) now you wouldnt think such a game would be so artistic and great...that's where my mind was blown with the game. i would spoil the rest. but you really need to play the game to realize how great it is.GLORY TO ARSTOTSKA9/10.
